text: Hi Samia, I'm good thank you. Thank you for connecting with me, I much appreciate it. The reason I wanted a mentor is to get more of an insight into the creative industry. I am interested in your career. How did you get into the job your doing?

Of course! I don’t know if Dexter told you but I’m located in Canada. I was born and raised in Montreal, but I actually studied in France. I studied in human resources at a university level. 
Before that, I wasn’t sure what I wanted to do so I took the administrative studies route which included mathematics. That way I wasn’t closing any doors (apart from the science one, I knew I wasn’t made for science!)
I am not sure how the UK system works. Will you have to choose an avenue quite early?
Here the first choice you make is around 17 years old.
